resources.string: Enter your username to log in with.
Enter the password for the username.
Enter the URL to the UBB.threads installation you want to chat on (it must support the app).
The cookie prefix for the UBB.threads installation. You need to ask the Administrator for this.
You have not entered all required preferences.

Droidprat is a chat app for Android which allows users to chat in the shoutbox of UBB.threads forums.

Developed by Olle Johansson.

More information available at http://github.com/ollej/prat
